name: Neptune
detail: One Nepture year lasts 164.8 Earth years. In fact, since it was discovered in 1846, Nepture has only copmleted 1 year, in 2011

name: Titan

detail: Titan, which has a diameter 50 percent larger than our Earth's moon, is one of the largest natural sateliites in our solar system
